name: Dal Baati Churma
recipe: Mix wheat flour with ghee and water to make a dough. Shape into balls and bake. Cook chana dal with spices. Crush the baked balls and mix with ghee and sugar to make churma. Serve dal with baati and churma.

name: Gatte ki Sabzi
recipe: Prepare dough with gram flour and spices, shape into cylinders and boil. Cut into pieces and fry. Cook a gravy with yogurt, spices, and tomatoes. Add the fried gatte to the gravy and simmer.

name: Ker Sangri
recipe: Soak ker and sangri overnight. Boil them and drain. Cook with spices and yogurt. Serve hot.
